title: 24 Feisty Felines Who Know What They Want and Will Stop at Nothing to Get It for Your Mid-Week Motivator
description: Yeehaw, it is the middle of the week, which means from this point forward we are looking forward towards the weekend and leaving those dismal memories of the beginning of the week squarely behind us. But with the coming of the middle of the week, our motivation typically takes a dip, because who has the energy to keep this work train going for a few more days. Which is why we made this list of feisty felines who know what they want and will stop at nothing to get it. Because there is no creature more meowtivated than a cat who wants something that they cannot have.From the kitten who has learned even in its young age, the value of going after that which it wants, to the clawminally motivated feline who takes on the impossible just to prove that it is possible, it is not even about the clawminal gains, to the curious catto whose curiosity got the best of it and led it to see what you had tucked away in your deleted folder…
author: Laurent Shinar
excerpt: 24 Feisty Felines Who Know What They Want and Will Stop at Nothing to Get It for Your Mid-Week Motivator - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals

html:
Yeehaw, it is the middle of the week, which means from this point forward we are looking forward towards the weekend and leaving those dismal memories of the beginning of the week squarely behind us. But with the coming of the middle of the week, our motivation typically takes a dip, because who has the energy to keep this work train going for a few more days. Which is why we made this list of feisty felines who know what they want and will stop at nothing to get it. Because there is no creature more meowtivated than a cat who wants something that they cannot have.

From the kitten who has learned even in its young age, the value of going after that which it wants, to the clawminally motivated feline who takes on the impossible just to prove that it is possible, it is not even about the clawminal gains, to the curious catto whose curiosity got the best of it and led it to see what you had tucked away in your deleted folder…
